summary: A camp fit for around 30 people to live in. Ideal for roleplaying in zombie mods, or simply having your followers on the road with you.
descriptionHtml:
A relatively large camp within the Rift. It has a dozen or two tents, some of which contain several beds, or supplies. Most tents, however, are small and therefore have one bedroll inside.

This was hard to do, and its quality is great, for the area used. There ARE points where tents and bedrolls don't look right... Even the large table, too. It is nothing that will ruin your experience, and it has been fully tested. It also comes with a set of armour, just like General Tullius', (Only belonging to a different General), but it is all heavy armour. Gloves, boots and body. This is part of the camp's backstory, you see. It also comes with two journals, for some lore about the camp, and what is going on. I heavily recommend this mod with a zombie mod, of which there are several.

I will add a larger backstory to the camp, as well as an NPC for every tent (except one for the player) upon request.
author: Svadas
